# Analysis of GCC Banks data using SQL 

```{r}
library(sqldf)
sqldf("SELECT * FROM join_panel")

```


Display the largest banks in the GCC my maximum total assets 

```{r}
library(sqldf)
sqldf("SELECT Ticker, date, COUNTRY , MAX(BS_CASH_NEAR_CASH_ITEM), MAX(BS_TOT_LOAN), MAX(BS_TOT_ASSET) FROM join_panel WHERE IS_ISLAMIC = FALSE GROUP BY  COUNTRY ORDER BY BS_TOT_ASSET DESC ")
```

```{r}
library(sqldf)
sqldf("SELECT DISTINCT Ticker, COUNTRY FROM join_panel GROUP BY COUNTRY")
```
